body: Yo I've been seeing these amazing cover pages on COMIC LOs man, does anyone know the artist or the name of the doujin?
@spacepaladin I get a lot of money if they die so jokes on you
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry, dont forgive me
I love loli boobs

@brook09 I remembered your translator's note from "Comic Learning", you said that there's nothing better than an impregnated Loli? That story from Nekodanshaku just fulfilled it. BTW, it's been a month since your message, so how's it going?
I liked Nekodanshaku's story in this issue. Is someone translating it already?

@RevyTwoHand As I’m sure you’re aware, nhentai is not a perfect archive of the internet, and the tagging system is even worse and very regularly miss/labels them. That being said, this was Boeun’s (lit in Japanese) debut work *in LO*, it says it on the P243. Obviously not every amateur artist debuts their first doujin in LO, airandou being a good example, but it also very likely that they’re a fairly new artist in terms of doujins if they’re “debuting” in a comic series of any kind. Finally, it’s not kanji, it’s hiragana, which is likely why google translate gave you a weird translation, “Bouen” is the correct name as hiragana is generally used for Japanese words/names, if it was in katakana: “Bowen” may be a way to translate it. So the artist you found on sankaku is likely the same person, especially if as you said, the art is similar.

Can anyone give me the kanji from page 243? The Contents page says it's  "Bouen" and the Google Translate app says the kanji means Bowen. With the title being something like "Chi-ra Chi-ra Sister". But I am finding nothing under any of these names and Bouen is not even listed under the Artists tag for this. I did find a page on chan.sankakucomplex.com/?tags=bouen that looks like the same art style thou. Or is this Bouen's first? I haven't had this much trouble tracking down an artist in awhile. Can any y'all can help?
@domdum21 You mean #226403 ?

I see next month's issue will have a 16p continuation of Gengorou's story. I'll try to pick it up as soon as it comes out, although I didn't expect this moth's issue to come out this early in digital format.
5/10 some story are great
Satuyo too.
God, LO is so full of amatures. They need to get more artists on Pon and Onizuka's level. Another 3/10 LO this month.
Dude, What the fuck happened with Ponsuke?! He just started doing NTR for some reason.... Whyyyyy?
it's YAGOO's favourite comic lmao
There's no airandou D:
p4 he has 3 arms
I came here for the yuri tag, but then I had to scroll through 300+ pages just to get to the yuri, and then yuri ended up sucking as well, fuck
Onizuka always gets shit done.

poster.username: 袖付き袖付きガイコッツ

body: Ah comments. Vanilla is kinkier to some ppl
If anyone else is as autistic as I am and wants to literally hit the character limit with their own opinions about porn, I’d love to read them.

Short personal overview cause I find it fun to review porn. Pretty lackluster, very vanilla overall, both in sex and actual story. Ponsuke kinda disappointing me, not only with NTR, but “hard” NTR, really not my thing.  Maeshima Ryou’s continues to have superb art and ahegao, though I’m still not a particular fan of MMF stuff. A surprisingly vanilla work from Kamita, took me by surprise, but it’s a bit “too” vanilla for me personally, just kinda lackluster. Onizuku Naoshi’s and Hasblow cream’s work are okay art, but I really dislike boyish lolis. Ujiie Moku and Mamezou’s work had potential and good art, but I don’t like anal or anal focus, also the latter has the weird suppository thing in the beginning. Fuyutzugu’s work is pretty good, but again, not a fan of MMF. Shishisenmaru is not someone I’m familiar with, but their art seems nice, the work is a bit too short and I don’t like ugly bastard. Everything else isn’t very noteworthy to me, this month is kinda lackluster/disappointing.
This is an extremely early upload of LO. Usually they uploaded halfway through the month, this got uploaded on first day of the month, not that I’m complaining
@brook09  , can you please translate katei saien , its a great one but no one translated it for months
They're all getting worse and worse, nothing exciting happening anymore. Same for Rustle etc  :(
it's rare to see some Ntr from Ponsucke
this time ,screw you ponsuke
The work from nekodanshaku, caught my eye it has some interesting features, i think i might try to translate it at the wekkend or so, if noe one else is going to pick it up.
I see ponsuke and Onizuka, Insta fav
